div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2359 Marseille (anc. Massalia), 1857 (660) Burial: end of 3rd cent. B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: 300 AE Massalia: Apollo/bull type Disposition: Marseille (part) † Chalande, RBN 1857, pp. 318-21, illus. Laugier, Les monnaies massaliotes du Cabinet des Médailles de Marseille (Marseille, 1887), pp. 34-5
